DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study ABT-436 Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.criteria: Has primary Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental DisordersFourth EditionText Revision diagnosis major depressive disorder without psychotic feature No current antidepressant treatment within 7 halflives 2 week , whichever longer , prior Day minus 1 . Can safely treated outpatient basis . A condition general good physical health . Surgically sterile , use highly effective method birth control ( female ) least 1 year post menopausal . History hypersensitivity , intolerance adverse reaction escitalopram lead discontinuation , hypersensitivity citalopram . History serotonin syndrome . Inadequate response two different antidepressant medication current major depressive episode . History electroconvulsive therapy , vagal nerve stimulation deep brain stimulation . History transcranial magnetic stimulation current major depressive episode . Psychotherapy ongoing least 3 month prior Day minus 1 .
